sentences.en: A group of Young Pioneers planted many pines around the martyr's monument.
sentences.cn: 一群少先队员在烈士纪念碑周围栽了许多松树.

sentences.en: A simple plaque marks the spot where the martyr died.
sentences.cn: 有一块素的饰板用以纪念该烈士的殉难处.

sentences.en: Ellsworth was a martyr to his sense of honour and responsibility.
sentences.cn: 埃尔斯沃思深为自己的荣誉感和责任感所累。

sentences.en: He always acts the martyr when he has to do the housework.
sentences.cn: 他一做家务事就装成舍生取义的样子.

sentences.en: He died a martyr in the cause of science.
He said that he was a martyr to his back.
sentences.cn: 他说他深受背痛的折磨。

sentences.en: I didn't take $ 1.00 a year to be a martyr.
sentences.cn: 我并不认为我一年只拿一个美元的薪金就可以成为烈士.

sentences.en: If he dies, he will become a martyr.
sentences.cn: 如果他死了, 他将成为烈士.

sentences.en: Jennifer responded with anger and played the martyr role.
sentences.cn: 珍妮弗做出愤怒的反应，开始大倒苦水。

sentences.en: St. Pancras was martyred in 304 A.D.
sentences.cn: 圣·潘克瑞斯在公元304年蒙难。

sentences.en: St. Stephen, the first Christian martyr
sentences.cn: 圣司提反，第一个基督教殉道者

sentences.en: The army has been held back because the government is reluctant to make martyrs of the protesters.
sentences.cn: 军队后撤了，因为政府不愿意造成抗议者牺牲。

sentences.en: The dead student is now being regarded as a martyr.
sentences.cn: 这位死去的学生现在被视为烈士。

sentences.en: The martyr laid down his life for the cause of national independence.
sentences.cn: 这位烈士是为了民族独立的事业而献身的.

sentences.en: The martyr's remains are buried at the foot of the hill.
sentences.cn: 烈士的遗体葬在山脚下.

sentences.en: The newspaper carried the martyr's photo framed in black.
sentences.cn: 报上登载了框有黑边的烈士遗像.

sentences.en: When are you going to quit acting like a martyr?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候才能不再摆出一副可怜样？

sentences.en: Wreaths were laid at the martyr's tomb.

trans.tran_cn: 烈士，殉道者，（因病等）长期受痛苦的人
trans.tran_en: someone who dies for their religious or political beliefs and is admired by people for this
If someone is martyred, they are killed or made to suffer greatly because of their religious or political beliefs
